lines.text: You have two choices, Captain. You can talk or we can make you talk.
We'll take care of the Captain when he arrives. Maybe I'll let you take care of him.
Will you, Admiral? Can I have him?
He has a reputation through all the islands. He's a tough man, Singapore.
My knife cuts through the toughest skin. I keep it sharp. Very sharp. Can I have him, Admiral?
Are you ready to decipher the map for me, Captain?
It is most regrettable. I think you will after a longer stay under the water.
